select_room_type.title: Select Room Type (Optional)
select_room_type.intro: Choose a room type to automatically configure timer values with recommended settings for that room. You can still adjust these values later in device settings, or skip this step to configure manually.
select_room_type.error_try_different: An error occurred. Please try a different template.
select_room_type.error_template_not_found: Template not found. Please select another template.
select_room_type.error_pairing_failed: Pairing framework failed to load. Please restart the Homey app and try again.
select_room_type.error_code_init_failed: If this persists, contact support with error code: HOMEY_INIT_FAILED
select_room_type.error_sdk_not_available: Homey SDK not available. Please restart pairing.
select_room_type.error_code_api_missing: If this persists, contact support with error code: HOMEY_API_MISSING

select_trigger_sensors.title: Select Motion Sensors
select_trigger_sensors.intro: Select the motion sensors that will trigger occupancy detection.
select_trigger_sensors.no_devices: No motion sensors found. Please add motion sensors to your Homey first.

select_reset_sensors.title: Select Reset Sensors
select_reset_sensors.intro: Select contact sensors that will reset occupancy when opened (e.g., doors, windows).
select_reset_sensors.skip_note: This step is optional. You can click Next to skip if you don't want to use reset sensors.
select_reset_sensors.no_devices: No contact sensors found. Click Next to continue without reset sensors.

select_wiab.title: Select WIAB Device
select_wiab.intro: Select the WIAB (Wasp in a Box) device that will provide occupancy input for this Room State Manager.
select_wiab.error_no_devices: No WIAB devices found. Please create a WIAB device first.
select_wiab.hint_device_selection: The selected WIAB device's occupancy state will be used as input for room state transitions.
select_wiab.error_pairing_failed: Pairing framework failed to load. Please restart the Homey app and try again.
select_wiab.error_sdk_not_available: Homey SDK not available. Please restart pairing.

define_states.title: Configure Room States
define_states.intro: The Room State Manager tracks extended occupancy states based on the WIAB device you selected.
define_states.state_idle: idle - Room is inactive (no activity detected)
define_states.state_extended_idle: extended_idle - Room has been idle for a while (optional)
define_states.state_extended_occupied: extended_occupied - Room has been active for a while (optional)
define_states.hint_idle_timeout: Minutes of inactivity before transitioning to extended_idle state. Set to 0 to disable.
define_states.hint_occupied_timeout: Minutes of activity before transitioning to extended_occupied state. Set to 0 to disable.

select_contact_sensors.title: Select Contact Sensors
select_contact_sensors.intro: Select the door and window contact sensors that will define the zone seal. When ANY sensor is open, the zone is considered leaky.
select_contact_sensors.no_devices: No contact sensors found. Please add door or window sensors to your Homey first.

intro.title: Circuit Breaker
intro.intro: Circuit Breakers provide hierarchical flow control for your Homey automations. Like electrical circuit breakers, they can be turned ON (allowing flows) or OFF (blocking flows).
intro.key_feature_text: Circuit breakers can be organized in a parent-child hierarchy. When a parent breaker is turned OFF, all of its child breakers automatically turn OFF as well.
intro.hierarchical_control_text: Organize breakers in a tree structure (e.g., "House" → "Floor 1" → "Living Room")
intro.cascade_behavior_text: Turning OFF a parent automatically turns OFF all descendants
intro.independent_children_text: Children can still be controlled independently regardless of parent state
intro.no_cycles_text: The system prevents circular dependencies automatically
intro.root_breakers_text: Breakers without a parent act as top-level controls
intro.next_step: In the next step, you'll optionally select a parent circuit breaker for this device. You can always change this later in device settings.

select_parent.title: Select Parent Breaker
select_parent.intro: Choose a parent circuit breaker for hierarchical control, or select "None" to create a root-level breaker.
select_parent.error_failed_to_load: Failed to load circuit breakers. Please try again.
select_parent.hint_parent_selection: When the parent breaker is turned OFF, this breaker will also turn OFF automatically.
select_parent.error_pairing_failed: Pairing framework failed to load. Please restart the Homey app and try again.
select_parent.error_sdk_not_available: Homey SDK not available. Please restart pairing.
